head.supplied: 9/7/85. ¶ To the Attendant at the office of the Hon. the Chief Secretary. ¶ ¶ Please let bearer have the parcels of dried plants, which the Under secretary was kindly ordered to be delivered to my De...

div.p: C85/5786, unit 258, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
To the Attendant at the office of the Hon. the Chief Secretary.

Please let bearer have the parcels of dried plants, which the Under secretary was kindly ordered to be delivered to my Department.
See M to T. Wilson, 9 June 1885 (in this edition as 85-06-09a). MS file annotation: 'Received 2 sets of dried plants 9 July 1885 Charles French'.

p.style: font-family: Geneva; font-size: 12pt; margin-left: 1.75in; margin-right: 0in; text-indent: 0in;
